summary: At Oxford, Austrian student Anna von Graz (Jacqueline Sassard) is dating fellow student William (Michael York), whom she plans to marry, but she ends up sleeping with two unhappily married Oxford professors instead.
cast: Dirk Bogarde|Stanley Baker|Jacqueline Sassard|Michael York|Vivien Merchant|Delphine Seyrig|Alexander Knox|Ann Firbank|Brian Phelan|Terence Rigby|Freddie Jones|Jill Johnson|Jane Hillary|Maxwell Caulfield|Carole Caplin|Harold Pinter|Nicholas Mosley|Steven Easton
title: Accidente
